result.arabic_text: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَدَعۡ أَذَىٰهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا
result.translation: 48. Kaadu koros kee munaafiqhiin kok ittam moggolinaay, ken adál ken ma-kataatinay koi baahaanam keenih cabaay, Yallal kelit. Yalli isil kelta mara dacayrih xiqahak addunyaay akeeral.
